title: THE 2016 SEASON DRAWS TO A CLOSE ON NOVEMBER 7!
body:
*wakes up*
*starts computer excited for update as todays date is 11/7/16*
*starts league of legends*
*no update*
*clicks on link to go to update*
*http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/preseason-2017*
*looks at time once again*
*looks back at the link*
*thinks am i blind?*

Fuck you riot today is the 11/7/2016 why do we have to wait for the ameri%%%%s to get to todays date just cause they're fucked and is a day or so behind doesnt mean we should have to fucking wait until the 11/8/2016 when the patch clearly says November 7 
**THE 2016 SEASON DRAWS TO A CLOSE ON NOVEMBER 7!**

00DAYS:16HOURS:27MINUTES:54
**THE 2017 SEASON WILL BEGIN ON DECEMBER 6TH!**
